Description: The name of the genome assembly version.
The biological type of the gene (e.g., protein-coding).
The type of object, such as gene.
A brief description of the gene.
The primary name of the gene.
The start position of the gene on the chromosome.
The end position of the gene on the chromosome.
Chromosome or region where the gene is located.
The species in which this gene is found.
The strand (direction) of the gene (1 or -1).
